CRIM.description: Per capita crime rate by town

ZN.description: Proportion of residential land zoned for lots over 25,000 sq.ft.

INDUS.description: Proportion of non-retail business acres per town

CHAS.description: Charles River dummy variable (= 1 if tract bounds river; 0 otherwise)

RM.description: Average number of rooms per dwelling

AGE.description: Proportion of owner-occupied units built prior to 1940

DIS.description: Weighted distances to five Boston employment centres

RAD.description: Index of accessibility to radial highways

B.description: 1000(Bk - 0.63)^2 where Bk is the proportion of blacks by town

MEDV.description: Median value of owner-occupied homes in $1000s

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in real estate.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the features of the houses in Boston, please predict the median value of owner-occupied homes.

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in urban planning.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the features of the neighborhoods in Boston, please predict the per capita crime rate.
prompt.answer_prompt: The predicted per capita crime rate is _______.

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in socio-economic studies.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the features of the neighborhoods in Boston, please predict the percentage of lower status population.
prompt.answer_prompt: The predicted percentage of lower status population is _______.
